title: Bug 5093Lost exported classpath entries
description: Bug 5093Lost exported classpath entries Build 2051. Check JRELIB so it is exported4.
OB: Open build path properties againObserve: JRELIB is not exported (but it is according to the .classpath)If you press OK without paying attention, you will loose the fact that JRELIBwas exported.
SR: Create new java project2. Open build path properties3. Press OK5. Open build path properties againObserve: JRELIB is not exported (but it is according to the .classpath)If you press OK without paying attention, you will loose the fact that JRELIBwas exported.
